summary: Brianna is an assassin follower which can change her body style and outfit within an instant.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][u][color=#ff9500]Requip Magic[/color][/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=6][u][color=#ff9500]Brianna[/color][/u][/size]
Made by cotoman3 and hfiani
Mod inspired by Fairy Tail's Erza Scarlet (Titania) Requip magic[/center]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/c0cf/5kiaoajflnx1ph9zg.jpg?size_id=5 [/img][/center]
[size=4]
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/e63a/27jqktacxz8tkxq9g.jpg?size_id=5 [/img][/center]
This mod adds a standalone assassin follower with the ability to give her custom body (from an included list) WHILE INGAME and INSTANTLY. Also it gives the ability an outfit manager for this follower up to.
What this mod does:
[list]
[*] INSTANT switch between body styles (UMP, CBBE, SevenBase) with multiple choices for each type.
[*] Adds an outfit manager for the Follower allowing you to add up to 16 outfits in total with 128 gear item (average 8 pieces per outfit).
[*] INSTANT change between outfits with few clicks.
[*] A Follower which is an assassin and thus better in two handed combat.
[*] She is also Marriable.
[/list]
[line]
[center]
Video by RipX
[youtube]lBqPbnrGE5M[/youtube][/center]
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/590e/cs80n992z5jxl2w9g.jpg?size_id=4 [/img][/center]
Install SKSE
Install UIExtensions
Unzip the files of Main file from this mod and put them into the Data folder. If you do not want the outfit and body system, you can just download the optional file and replace ESP.
Go to Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun. just talk to her to follow you. If you think it is too much trouble to go there, just use "Brianna's Manager" power to teleport her to you or you to her.
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/2bdb/nd09au49ez6n6o79g.jpg?size_id=4 [/img][/center]
Delete the files you extracted. if you don't know them delete those:
[list]
[*] File: Brianna.esp
[*] File: Brianna.bsa
[*] File: Brianna.bsl
[*] Folder: meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Brianna.esp
[*] Folder: Textures\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\Brianna.esp
[/list]
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/ace7/6d9tywiwded732v9g.jpg?size_id=4 [/img][/center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709] DIMONIZED UNP female body - by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666] Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition - CBBE - by Ousnius and Caliente[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992] SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer - by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602] Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056] Mikan Eyes - by nerune[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24723] Seraphine Armor - by BloodFree[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6063] DaggerCraft Mutilator - by faxivcm[/url]
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/0671/rn4y49sb2so4c369g.jpg?size_id=5 [/img][/center]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]skse[/url]: Required
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57046/]UIExtensions[/url]: Required

Nothing makes a conflict. If you encounter a mod which does, please contact me.
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/f1f1/h4gshu4ahmeb8of9g.jpg?size_id=5 [/img][/center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81738] Teleport Art - Thunder God Jutsu - by cotoman3[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50698] Tame the Beasts of Skyrim II - by hfiani and myriliam and TheSkoomaKing[/url]
[line]
[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/23b1/81af7n3013xt8y39g.jpg?size_id=3 [/img][/center]
[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Where to find Brianna?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Whiterun Temple Of Kynareth.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] I cannot go to Whiterun for reasons too personal to state, what to do?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Use the "Brianna's manager" power to teleport her to you.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Is she marriable?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Yes.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Can i play "Who has the better outfit" while she is not my follower?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Yes.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Can I change her outfit during Combat?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Yes.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Will you make a standalone outfit manager that works on any follower?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Maybe. Who knows.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Will you make another follower with the same functions?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Yes, probably.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] Can I vote and endorse for your mod?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Of course you can! Endorse now and vote in April, and thank you.

[color=#cc0000]Q:[/color] I don't want the outfit manager, just a body?
[color=#38761d]A:[/color] Just extract the main file and overwrite the ESP considering whwat body type you want.

Any questions/comments/suggestions please post them in the comments section
[/size]

[center]
